title: Bloodlines
description: This is an old chapbook that is now unavailable. Read these stories in the newly released, and completely free, novella "Bloodlines", part one of the Blood War trilogy._____________A war has raged for the better part of six hundred years: werewolves, vampires and hybrids, locked in brutal conflict within the darkness of the mortal world. A covert mission to Normandyâ€™s beaches; a secretive agenda during the Russian Revolution; a callous hunt through the Parisian streets.Three immortal races . . . three bloodlines . . . three reasons to keep you awake at night.An addendum to the novel Blood War and containing a Foreword by former Graveside Tales Chief Editor Myrrym Davies, Bloodlines is a bold step into the horrific, bloodthirsty world of supernatural immortals. Do you believe in monsters?
author: Dylan J. Morgan
